MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the ML5 postcode area of Coatbridge, affecting properties in West George Street and surrounding streets. We had no advance warning of it and only became aware of this at 2.06PM. Our engineers have arrived on site and are investigating an underground cable fault near Windmill Hill substation. Our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible. We expect the power to be restored by 10.00AM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was recorded at 8.42AM on 23 January 2021.
